title: India Regulator Pursues Fund Diversion Allegations Against Zee
desc: India’s market regulator has issued a show-cause notice to Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. and its leadership, reviving allegations of fund diversion and governance lapses that derailed its planned merger Sony Pictures Networks India.

title: President Mahama told me I would be MCE but some people changed it - Alhaji Umar Sanda
